Package com.example.mydmsproject.model

Class Paddle

java.lang.Object
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Sprite
com.example.mydmsproject.model.Paddle
public class Paddle extends Sprite
A Sprite class implements the main game element Paddle, controlled by keyboard or mouse.

  • Constructor Summary
